Natalie Smith is currently a graduate student in the Data Science and Analytics (DSAN) Master's program at Georgetown University.

```{=html}
<center><img src="mypicture.png" height="400" width="400"></center>
```
<br>

She has lived in the DC area since 2015, starting with getting her undergraduate degree at the George Washington University where she double majored with a B.S. in Statistics and a B.S. in Political Science. After graduation, she spent three years working in the defense consulting space, acting as a data analyst, operations research analyst, software tester, project manager, consultant, and wargame designer among other roles before returning to school to join the world of data science.

Her hobbies include exercising, hiking, cooking, playing video games, gardening, and exploring the DC and Northern Virginia area in her free time!
